name: Old woman becomes a young beauty
motif: An old or ugly woman is transformed into a young beauty or becomes rich. Usually another old woman tries to imitate her but dies or suffers a reverse.
Mythemes:
- Transformation: An old or ugly woman is transformed into a young beauty or becomes rich.
- Imitation Attempt: Another old woman attempts to replicate the transformation.
- Negative Outcome: The imitator either dies or suffers adverse consequences.
